simplified: 又想当婊子又想立牌坊
traditional: 又想當婊子又想立牌坊
pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1

definitions.you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3: lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom); fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation; to want to have one's cake and eat it too;
